Chula_Vista.Area code 619: Area code 619 is a California telephone area code that was split from 714 on November 5, 1982. This area code currently covers the southern half of the city of San Diego and its eastern and southern suburbs. Area code 619 was the first new area code in California since 707 was added in 1959, the first to be added nationwide since area code 804 was split off from 703 in 1973, and the second area code added since 1966.
